_metadata.description: Text sentiment analysis dataset with labeled reviews, comments, and social media posts for sentiment classification models.
_metadata.author: Molla Samser (Founder)
_metadata.copyright: Â© 2026 RSK World - Free Programming Resources & Source Code

data.text: Absolutely love this product! It exceeded all my expectations and the quality is outstanding. Will definitely recommend to friends and family.
The service was okay, nothing special. Delivery was on time but the packaging could have been better. Average experience overall.
Terrible experience! The product arrived damaged and customer support was unhelpful. Complete waste of money. Never ordering again.
This is the best purchase I've made this year! The features are amazing and it works exactly as advertised. Highly satisfied customer here!
Received the package today. It looks decent but haven't tried it yet. Will update after a week of use.
So disappointed with this purchase. The description was misleading and the actual product is nothing like what was shown in the pictures.
Great value for money! The build quality is solid and it performs really well. Shipping was fast too. Very happy with this purchase!
Just unboxed my order. Standard quality, meets basic requirements. Not exceptional but does the job. Fair price for what you get.
Worst customer service I've ever experienced. Three weeks and my issue is still not resolved. Absolutely frustrating and unprofessional.
Five stars! This product changed my daily routine for the better. Excellent quality, beautiful design, and amazing functionality!
The product works as expected. Nothing extraordinary but nothing to complain about either. Average performance for the price point.
Completely broken on arrival! Requested a refund but still waiting after two weeks. This company has lost a customer forever.
Impressed beyond words! The attention to detail is remarkable. Best investment I've made in a long time. Truly exceptional product!
Received my order yesterday. First impressions are neither good nor bad. Will need more time to form a complete opinion.
Don't waste your money on this garbage! Poor quality materials, horrible design, and falls apart after first use. Total scam!
Amazing quality and fast delivery. The product looks even better in person than in the photos. Exceeded my expectations!
It's an average product. Does what it's supposed to do but nothing more. No complaints but no praises either.
Horrible experience from start to finish. The product is a complete failure and the company refuses to acknowledge issues.
Best thing I've bought online! Super impressed with the quality. Already ordered two more for gifts. Highly recommend!
Package arrived in good condition. The item seems okay. Will test it more before giving a final verdict.
Avoid this product at all costs! It stopped working after just one week. Customer support is non-existent.
Wow! Just wow! This exceeded every expectation I had. Worth every penny and more. Thank you for this amazing product!
Standard shipping, standard product, standard everything. Nothing stood out positively or negatively about this purchase.
Extremely disappointed. False advertising and poor quality. Demanded refund but got no response. Stay away!
I can't believe how good this is! My whole family loves it. Best decision we made this month.
The product arrived on time. Packaging was adequate. Performance is exactly as described - nothing more, nothing less.
Total rip-off! The quality is nowhere near what was promised. Feeling completely cheated by this purchase.
Outstanding! This has become an essential part of my daily life. Can't imagine going back to what I used before.
It works. That's about all I can say. Not impressed but not disappointed either. Just a regular product.
Save your money and buy something else. This product is a joke. Worst purchase I've ever made online.
Life-changing product! I've already recommended it to all my friends and colleagues. Simply the best out there.
Decent quality for the price. Does the basic functions well. Might consider buying again in the future.
Absolutely terrible! Broke within days of purchase. No warranty support. Complete waste of time and money.
Perfect in every way! From ordering to delivery to the product itself - everything was flawless. 10/10!
Mixed feelings about this purchase. Some features are good, others not so much. Overall, it's just okay.
Regret buying this. The reviews were misleading and the product quality is subpar. Very disappointed.
Exceeded expectations! The quality is superb and the price was very reasonable. Already planning my next purchase.
Nothing special about this product. It's functional but unremarkable. Average across all aspects.
Complete disaster! Product arrived late, damaged, and different from description. Absolute nightmare experience.
Fantastic product! My friends were so impressed they all ordered one too. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
Adequate for basic needs. Won't wow you but won't let you down either. Fair deal for the money.
Horrible quality control! Every unit I received had defects. Finally gave up and demanded a full refund.
This is everything I hoped for and more! Beautifully designed, perfectly functional, absolutely love it!
Product is okay. Nothing wrong with it per se, just doesn't stand out from the competition in any way.
Never again! This company has lost all credibility with me. Product failed, support failed, everything failed.
Brilliant! Such attention to detail and quality craftsmanship. A true gem among similar products.
Got what I paid for. No surprises, good or bad. Standard experience with a standard product.
Disappointed beyond words. Such high hopes based on the marketing, but reality was very different.
Simply phenomenal! This has improved my life in ways I didn't expect. Worth every single penny!
Middle of the road product. Neither excited nor upset about this purchase. It serves its purpose.
